title: Senior Developer (PHP/Yii)
description:
Vacancy: Senior Developer (PHP / Yii), remote

About the Company:
A Legal Tech company specializing in the automation of parking case processing and debt collection management.

Role Overview:
We are looking for a Senior Developer to work with an established platform, enhance its performance and reliability, and contribute to its ongoing evolution.
This role requires not only hands-on development but also architectural thinking and long-term technical vision.

Responsibilities:
‚Ä¢ Maintain and improve the existing PHP/Yii codebase, ensuring continuity and system stability
‚Ä¢ Refactor and gradually modernize existing components
‚Ä¢ Actively contribute to defining and shaping system architecture, not just implementing predefined solutions
‚Ä¢ Participate in and lead architectural discussions, proposing sustainable long-term approaches
‚Ä¢ Propose architectural improvements and new technologies for implementation
‚Ä¢ Collaborate closely with the Project Manager and team members on technical and product decisions
‚Ä¢ Ensure high code quality, reliability, and overall system stability

Tech Stack / Environment
‚Ä¢ Current stack: PHP, Yii
‚Ä¢ Database: PostgreSQL, MySQL
‚Ä¢ Focus on long-term maintainability, scalability, and code quality

Requirements
‚Ä¢ Experience 3‚Äì6 years of professional software development experience
‚Ä¢ Strong hands-on experience with Yii framework (mandatory)
‚Ä¢ Solid experience with PostgreSQL and MySQL

Technical Skills
‚Ä¢ Strong understanding of object-oriented programming principles and design patterns
‚Ä¢ Experience building and consuming RESTful APIs
‚Ä¢ Front-end experience (Vue.js) is a plus

Soft Skills
‚Ä¢ Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities
‚Ä¢ Ability to work independently and as part of a team
‚Ä¢ Proactive mindset with architectural thinking

Portfolio
‚Ä¢ All applicants will be asked to provide examples of previous work to demonstrate their experience

‚Ä¢ English - good technical English, confident in written communication and handling technical tasks in English

To apply:

title: Principal Engineer (PHP)
description:
TL;DR

Principal Engineer (Architecture): Defining and owning the future architecture and technical direction for the Merchant Experience pillar with an accent on scalability, integration, and performance. Focus on contributing to engineering-wide strategy, solving complex architecture-related problems, and mentoring development teams in best practices.

Location: Remote within EMEA. Opportunity to work remotely or in offices in Riga, Tallinn, or a co-working space in Barcelona.

Company

FYUL, formed in 2024 through the merger of hirify.global, Printify, and Snow Commerce, powers on-demand commerce at a global scale by bringing together tech, talent, and infrastructure.

What you will do

  • Take ownership of solutions and technical direction within the Merchant Experience pillar.
  • Define and review architecture and technical decisions, ensuring alignment with platform strategy and practices.
  • Contribute to engineering-wide strategy and standards through the Architecture Council.
  • Guide development teams through implementation by providing POCs and explaining design details.
  • Investigate and solve a variety of architecture-related problems, such as performance, scalability, and integration.
  • Mentor and train other team members on design techniques and coding standards.

Requirements

  • At least 10 years of proven experience in software engineering, including roles like Staff/Principal Engineer, Lead Developer, or Software Architect.
  • Expert-level theoretical and practical understanding of Domain-Driven Design (DDD) principles and Microservices architecture.
  • Solid understanding of software fundamentals including Data Structures, Software Architecture, Design Patterns, and Distributed Systems.
  • Experience with AWS or other cloud platforms (Google Cloud or Azure).
  • English: C1+ required for excellent written and spoken communication.

Nice to have

  • Expert-level PHP knowledge.
  • Experience with PostgreSQL and MySQL.
  • Understanding of front-end technologies, including VueJS.

Culture & Benefits

  • A global, inclusive team that is supportive and ambitious.
  • Flexible working hours, with the option to start your day as late as 11 AM.
  • Private health insurance.
  • 3 extra paid days off (2 for well-being, 1 for a personal celebration).
  • Internal and external learning opportunities, access to mentorship, internal meetups, and hackathons.
  • Employee discount for designing and ordering custom merchandise.
  • Exciting team-building events and parties.

title: Fullstack PHP Developer (Fintech)
description:
TL;DR

Intermediate Software Engineer (PHP, React): Building and enhancing features for a core merchant management platform with an accent on PHP/Laravel and React development, database optimization, and ensuring software quality. Focus on navigating complex systems, solving interesting engineering challenges, and collaborating within an agile Scrum team.

Location: Remote work is available from Argentina, Brazil, Colombia, Kazakhstan, Ukraine, Mexico, or Uruguay. Onsite options are available in Almaty, Astana, Dnipro, Kharkiv, Kyiv, Lviv, Monterrey, Montevideo, Odesa, or Rosario.

Company

Our client is a company that empowers partners with flexible, modern payment solutions, widely used behind the scenes to power innovative payment experiences for SMBs, entrepreneurs, and fintech startups.

What you will do

  • Design, build, and enhance features within Merchant Central using PHP/Laravel and React.
  • Develop efficient database queries and optimize MySQL performance.
  • Write unit, integration, and end-to-end tests to ensure code quality.
  • Document critical business logic, application workflows, and architectural decisions.
  • Collaborate with Product Managers, SRE, and QA teams on requirements and technical solution design.
  • Contribute to continuous improvement of development processes and engineering practices.

Requirements

  • Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience.
  • 3+ years of experience developing complex applications.
  • Strong experience with Laravel or similar modern PHP frameworks.
  • Experience with modern frontend development (JavaScript/React, NPM, basic CSS/SCSS).
  • Strong understanding of object-oriented programming and design patterns.
  • Experience with relational databases such as MySQL (schema design, query optimization).

Nice to have

  • Experience with containerization technologies (Docker, Kubernetes).
  • Experience with caching technologies (Redis, Memcached).
  • Familiarity with GraphQL.
  • Experience with logging & monitoring systems (e.g., Logz.io).
  • Understanding of cloud-native or SaaS architectures.
  • Experience using agentic AI tooling.

Culture & Benefits

  • Vacation as per the laws of your country.
  • Assistance with health insurance policy for you and your loved ones.
  • 10 days sick pay without a doctor's note.
  • Time off for state holidays according to the official calendar.
  • Corporate parties and small get-togethers.
  • Comfort service for technical and everyday problems at work.
  • Opportunities to work on global projects and grow your career.
